name: The Last Ranger: Lost in Space
name_original: The Last Ranger: Lost in Space
description:
Your the last Ranger of you squadron they have been wiped out and alone in-space with no way of getting home and your earths last hope, You must face off a huge bombardment from the oncoming alien armada. Your goal is to survive as long as you can and to destroy the alien mother-ship and stop the aliens discovering the location to earth, 

 Code: COLE PROTOCOL IS IN EFFECT AT ALL COSTS. THEY MUST NOT LEARN THE LOCATION OF EARTH! WE ARE IN THE ENDGAME NOW...........098"!??£$%@#..............
